name: A Las Tres
description:
Follow the story of of a father trying to have a better life for him and his family by migrating to a place that has more opportunity.

Controls: W,A,S,D / Arrow Key Movement, E to interact with objects, Click with mouse through menus

Awesome Tip: In options you can switch between english and Spanish options. (Everything should be translated . . . maybe not grammatically correct but it should be legible)

Note: The last scene TBD is not a scene you can exit from game, I have fix but will not be able to upload in time for deadline.

Extra Credits ;D: Some backgrounds from ansimuz, edermunizz. Some room props by Mercyssh (with some perspective edits). Soundly for an awesome free sound library! Youtube & Unity Documentation!
